list.description_render:
Fomo3D is an ironic jab at the cryptocurrency ICO space, putting every player in the terrifying and tempting position to Exit Scam everything and run away with massive life-changing amounts of real Ethereum.

You should take it.

Made by Team JUST as a 100% trustless library of smart contracts. Fomo3D is intentionally designed so that developers  have no access to the funds or influence on the rounds. 
The game runs entirely on human greed, to the profit of everyone playing.

list.description_render: LatiumX  is  the  first  and  only  tasking  platform and exchange  to  incorporate  a  totally automated  rating  system  in  tandem  with  a  one-to-many  task  relationship structure. list.description_render: AirSwap is a decentralized token marketplace powered by search. Designed as the future of trading by founders Michael Oved – a veteran algorithmic trader – and full stack product designer-engineer, Don Mosites, AirSwap’s global peer-to-peer trading network simplifies trading and maximizes liquidity with more tokens, better prices and no fees. AirSwap.io for details and updates.

list.description_render:
Panda.Earth is a social simulation APP built on blockchain.
Key features:
1. Only authorized partner of China Conservation and Research Center for Giant Panda on block chain. Panda.Earth will make every real, rare, and adorable panda a digital copy and store them on blockchain. These cryptopandas are in real mapping, uniqueness, rareness and popularity. 
2. Based on cryptopanda, we extend the Crypto-Collectibles trading. That is to say, cryptopandas can exchange to other crypto-collectibles in Panda.Earth.
3.  We also extend digital currency transactions based on crypto-collectibles. Example, you can purchase cryptopandas through token A, but choose token B to sell it.
list.title: Panda Earth
list.description:

list.description_render:
Crypto Space Commander (CSC) is a sandbox space MMO that operates in a completely real-time, player-controlled economy. Players can travel to different star systems, mine stellar bodies for resources, craft items and ships to sell, battle pirates and other players while commanding their very own starship!

CSC is the first blockchain-based space exploration game built in Unity3D. CSC utilizes the Ethereum blockchain to secure game assets, enforce P2P contract actions, and run the game economy.
list.title: CSC - Crypto Space Commander
list.description:
Crypto Space Commander (CSC) is a sandbox space MMO that operates in a completely real-time, player-controlled economy. Players can travel to different star systems, mine stellar bodies for resources, craft items and ships to sell, battle pirates and other players while commanding their very own starship!

CSC is the first blockchain-based space exploration game built in Unity3D. CSC utilizes the Ethereum blockchain to secure game assets, enforce P2P contract actions, and run the game economy.

list.description_render: CryptoMiningWar is a block-chain based mining contest game. Each of the players will get a free miner in the beginning, and the crystals produced by the miner can be used to buy more miners. You will have a higher hashrate by getting more miners. Players with the hashrate over 10000 will have the opportunity to enter the ranking list, and top 10 players in the ranking list will share the prize pool.

list.description_render:
Crypton are cute, loveable, huggable mysterious creatures that reside within the Ethereum Blockchain.

There’s no distinction between male and female, but there exists tons of differentiation in color and pattern. Roughly 3.6 quadrillion types of Crypton appear within the game! Collect, trade, and breed for rare discoveries!
